reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress elegant, with one noting it makes them feel attractive, and many saying it looks expensive. The dress receives positive feedback for its perfect fit, comfortable stretchy material, and flattering ruched design that creates an hourglass shape. They appreciate its versatility as a wedding guest dress, particularly for fall events, and praise its nice material and emerald color. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THIS DRESS
items.body: I bought this as a wedding guest for a black tie wedding, it looks expensive, fits perfectly and its so stretchy and comfortable. I love this dress. Read more
items.author: Ashlie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Love it! It does have a purple undertone which I didnt care for. It's not a true white, but it fit wonderfully. Its sheer, but not see through. Great stretch! I need it in other colors. Read more
items.author: Millie Zaranyika

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars winner winner chicken dinner
items.body: so i ordered 3 dresses hoping maybe one would look good. last minute, the black tie wedding was in 3 days. this dress ended up being my pick. it is SO comfortable. just felt like wearing a comfy long fitted tee or something. it's just cool and different. i went with this one cause i didn't need to get it shortened. and also cause it was the most comfy. the sheer is great. if you're a shorty like me, it's not fully the best for pics. if you take a pic in it, just make sure you accentuate your curves:) lots of compliments. i could not have been happier with it!! very glad that it's now a part of my wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Nina B. Gettes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a wow dress
items.body: This dress is so flattering! It hides ANY imperfections. When it arrives it won’t look great but as soon as you put it on it is an immediate wow! Would purchase again! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Seems to be true to size!
items.body: Nice sizing and fit. Beautiful material. More of a Teal Jade than Emerald I thought it would be, but still very pretty. I paid about $50 which is high in comparison to other dresses I’ve purchased with similar material/design,but I needed it for an event, otherwise would have waited for the price to come down. 3.5-4stars Water from being outside all day during our school’s annual Pumpkin Run. Purchased to be a citizen of the Emerald City. Read more
items.author: DIANA

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality for the price
items.body: I love this dress and it fits perfect. It's soft and comfortable. It's stretches with your body. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Maxi Evening Cocktail Bodycon Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Maxi Evening Cocktail Bodycon Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine Red, White, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
